comment.author: 44001330@N02
comment._content: The artillery piece is probably a BL 9.2 inch howitzer. Note the barrel wagon in front with the firing platform in the middle and the carriage/cradle assembly following behind all in a sort of road train.

comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called History of Canadian Science and Technology, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
